CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 17, 1946, pg. 5, reads: "An Attractive Display Nets Sales - Mr. H. I. Kass, right, Sales Supervisor of the Philip Morris Company, discusses with Co-manager Joseph Finch, of the recently opened Herron - Centre Drug store, Centre and Herron Avenues, the value of an attractively decorated window in increasing sales. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Joseph Finch and H. I. Kass standing in front of Philip Morris advertising display in window of Herron - Centre Drugstore, Hill District
